activities: Our clients use our software to file property tax returns and to manage business licenses, and any PI required for either of these functions might be input into the software which we host on our servers.
personaldata: Hosted software end user log-in information and entity client data which may include its officers' and/or partners' personal data to the extent required for tax return filings. No information is manually processed by Tax Compliance, Inc.
recoursemech: Our affiliate currently uses BBB EU Safe Harbor and we are in the process of registering Tax Compliance, Inc. as well.
